trans-unit.source: Manage PCs with client software | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Manage PCs with client software | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Manage Windows PCs by installing the Intune client software.
trans-unit.target: Manage Windows PCs by installing the Intune client software.

trans-unit.source: Manage Windows PCs with Intune PC client software
trans-unit.target: Manage Windows PCs with Intune PC client software

trans-unit.source: Instead of [enrolling Windows PCs as mobile devices](set-up-windows-device-management-with-microsoft-intune.md), you can enroll and manage Windows PCs by installing the Intune client software.
trans-unit.target: Instead of [enrolling Windows PCs as mobile devices](set-up-windows-device-management-with-microsoft-intune.md), you can enroll and manage Windows PCs by installing the Intune client software.

trans-unit.source: Intune manages Windows PCs using policies similar to the way Windows Server Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) Group Policy Objects (GPOs) do.
trans-unit.target: Intune manages Windows PCs using policies similar to the way Windows Server Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) Group Policy Objects (GPOs) do.

trans-unit.source: If you will be managing Active Directory domain-joined computers with Intune, you should [be sure that Intune policies do not conflict with any GPOs](resolve-gpo-and-microsoft-intune-policy-conflicts.md) that are in place for your organization.
trans-unit.target: If you will be managing Active Directory domain-joined computers with Intune, you should [be sure that Intune policies do not conflict with any GPOs](resolve-gpo-and-microsoft-intune-policy-conflicts.md) that are in place for your organization.

trans-unit.source: While the Intune software client supports [management capabilities that help protect PCs](policies-to-protect-windows-pcs-in-microsoft-intune.md) by managing software updates, Windows firewall, and Endpoint Protection, PCs managed with the Intune software client cannot be targeted with other Intune policies, including those **Windows** policy settings specific to mobile device management.
trans-unit.target: While the Intune software client supports [management capabilities that help protect PCs](policies-to-protect-windows-pcs-in-microsoft-intune.md) by managing software updates, Windows firewall, and Endpoint Protection, PCs managed with the Intune software client cannot be targeted with other Intune policies, including those **Windows** policy settings specific to mobile device management.

trans-unit.source: Devices running Windows 8.1 or later can be managed with either the Intune client or as mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Devices running Windows 8.1 or later can be managed with either the Intune client or as mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: This topic applies to computers running the Intune software client.
trans-unit.target: This topic applies to computers running the Intune software client.

trans-unit.source: Installing the Intune client and enrolling in mobile device management is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Installing the Intune client and enrolling in mobile device management is not supported.

trans-unit.source: Requirements for Intune PC client management
trans-unit.target: Requirements for Intune PC client management

trans-unit.source: **Hardware**: The following are minimum hardware requirements for installing the Intune client:
trans-unit.target: **Hardware**: The following are minimum hardware requirements for installing the Intune client:

trans-unit.source: Requirement
trans-unit.target: Requirement

trans-unit.source: More information
trans-unit.target: More information

trans-unit.source: Network
trans-unit.target: Network

trans-unit.source: The client requires the PC to have Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: The client requires the PC to have Internet connectivity.

trans-unit.source: Processor and Memory
trans-unit.target: Processor and Memory

trans-unit.source: Refer to the processor and RAM requirements for the PC's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the processor and RAM requirements for the PC's operating system.

trans-unit.source: Disk space
trans-unit.target: Disk space

trans-unit.source: 200 MB available disk space before the client software is installed.
trans-unit.target: 200 MB available disk space before the client software is installed.

trans-unit.source: **Software**: The following are software requirements for installing the client:
trans-unit.target: **Software**: The following are software requirements for installing the client:

trans-unit.source: Requirement
trans-unit.target: Requirement

trans-unit.source: More information
trans-unit.target: More information

trans-unit.source: Operating system
trans-unit.target: Operating system

trans-unit.source: Windows device running Windows Vista or later.
trans-unit.target: Windows device running Windows Vista or later.

trans-unit.source: Home edition versions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Home edition versions are not supported.

trans-unit.source: Administrative permissions
trans-unit.target: Administrative permissions

trans-unit.source: The account that installs the client software must have local administrator permissions on that device.
trans-unit.target: The account that installs the client software must have local administrator permissions on that device.

trans-unit.source: Windows Installer 3.1
trans-unit.target: Windows Installer 3.1

trans-unit.source: The PC must have, at a minimum, Windows Installer 3.1.
trans-unit.target: The PC must have, at a minimum, Windows Installer 3.1.

trans-unit.source: To view the version of Windows Installer on a PC:
trans-unit.target: To view the version of Windows Installer on a PC:

trans-unit.source: - On the PC, right-click **%windir%\System32\msiexec.exe**, and then click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: - On the PC, right-click **%windir%\System32\msiexec.exe**, and then click **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: You can download the latest version of Windows Installer from [Windows Installer Redistributables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=234258) on the Microsoft Developer Network website.
trans-unit.target: You can download the latest version of Windows Installer from [Windows Installer Redistributables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=234258) on the Microsoft Developer Network website.

trans-unit.source: Remove incompatible client software
trans-unit.target: Remove incompatible client software

trans-unit.source: Before you install the Intune client software, you must uninstall the any Configuration Manager or System Management Server client software from that PC.
trans-unit.target: Before you install the Intune client software, you must uninstall the any Configuration Manager or System Management Server client software from that PC.

trans-unit.source: Computer management with the Intune computer client
trans-unit.target: Computer management with the Intune computer client

trans-unit.source: After the Intune client software is installed, management capabilities include: [application management](deploy-apps-in-microsoft-intune.md), [real-time monitoring and Endpoint Protection](help-secure-windows-pcs-with-endpoint-protection-for-microsoft-intune.md), [Windows Firewall settings management](help-protect-windows-pcs-using-windows-firewall-policies-in-microsoft-intune.md), hardware and software inventory, remote control (through remote assistance requests), [software update settings](keep-windows-pcs-up-to-date-with-software-updates-in-microsoft-intune.md), and compliance settings reporting.
trans-unit.target: After the Intune client software is installed, management capabilities include: [application management](deploy-apps-in-microsoft-intune.md), [real-time monitoring and Endpoint Protection](help-secure-windows-pcs-with-endpoint-protection-for-microsoft-intune.md), [Windows Firewall settings management](help-protect-windows-pcs-using-windows-firewall-policies-in-microsoft-intune.md), hardware and software inventory, remote control (through remote assistance requests), [software update settings](keep-windows-pcs-up-to-date-with-software-updates-in-microsoft-intune.md), and compliance settings reporting.

trans-unit.source: Certain management options available to PCs managed as mobile devices are unavailable to the software client-managed PCs including:
trans-unit.target: Certain management options available to PCs managed as mobile devices are unavailable to the software client-managed PCs including:

trans-unit.source: Full wipe (selective wipe is available)
trans-unit.target: Full wipe (selective wipe is available)

trans-unit.source: Conditional access
trans-unit.target: Conditional access

trans-unit.source: Windows policies other than **Computer management** policies
trans-unit.target: Windows policies other than **Computer management** policies

trans-unit.source: Policies template for Windows PCs
trans-unit.target: Policies template for Windows PCs

trans-unit.source: In addition to the Intune client agent actions taken locally on individual computers, you can also use the Intune admin console to perform other [common computer management tasks](common-windows-pc-management-tasks-with-the-microsoft-intune-computer-client.md) on Windows PCs with the client installed to:
trans-unit.target: In addition to the Intune client agent actions taken locally on individual computers, you can also use the Intune admin console to perform other [common computer management tasks](common-windows-pc-management-tasks-with-the-microsoft-intune-computer-client.md) on Windows PCs with the client installed to:

trans-unit.source: View hardware and software inventory information about managed computers
trans-unit.target: View hardware and software inventory information about managed computers

trans-unit.source: Remotely restart a computer
trans-unit.target: Remotely restart a computer

trans-unit.source: Retire a computer to uninstall the client software and remove it from management with Intune
trans-unit.target: Retire a computer to uninstall the client software and remove it from management with Intune

trans-unit.source: Link users to specific managed computers
trans-unit.target: Link users to specific managed computers

trans-unit.source: Respond to remote assistance requests
trans-unit.target: Respond to remote assistance requests

trans-unit.source: The Intune client agent usually runs quietly in the background without the need for much user interaction or troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: The Intune client agent usually runs quietly in the background without the need for much user interaction or troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: However, should you need help in resolving computer management issues, there are several [resources available to help you solve them](/intune/troubleshoot/troubleshoot-client-setup-in-microsoft-intune).
trans-unit.target: However, should you need help in resolving computer management issues, there are several [resources available to help you solve them](/intune/troubleshoot/troubleshoot-client-setup-in-microsoft-intune).
